00013 #include "DataStorage/common.hpp"

00015 namespace isis
00016 {
00017 
00018 namespace data

00020 
00021 namespace _internal
00022 {
00023 
00024 void transformCoords( isis::util::PropMap &properties, boost::numeric::ublas::matrix<float> transform )
00025 {
00026     // this implementation assumes that the PropMap properties is either a
00027     // data::Chunk or a data::Image object. Hence it should contain the
00028     // properties readVec, phaseVec, sliceVec and indexOrigin.
00029     // get read, phase and slice vector from property map
00030     isis::util::fvector4 read = properties.getProperty<util::fvector4>( "readVec" );
00031     isis::util::fvector4 phase = properties.getProperty<util::fvector4>( "phaseVec" );
00032     isis::util::fvector4 slice = properties.getProperty<util::fvector4>( "sliceVec" );
00033     // get index origin from property map
00034     isis::util::fvector4 indexorig = properties.getProperty<util::fvector4>( "indexOrigin" );
00035     // create boost::numeric data structures
00036     // STEP 1 transform orientation matrix
00037     // input matrix
00038     boost::numeric::ublas::matrix<float> R_in( 3, 3 );
00039 
00040     for( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ ) {
00041         R_in( i, 0 ) = read[i];
00042         R_in( i, 1 ) = phase[i];
00043         R_in( i, 2 ) = slice[i];
00044     }
00045 
00046     // output matrix
00047     boost::numeric::ublas::matrix<float> R_out( 3, 3 );
00048     R_out = boost::numeric::ublas::prod( transform, R_in );
00049 
00050     for ( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ ) {
00051         read[i] = R_out( i, 0 );
00052         phase[i] = R_out( i, 1 );
00053         slice[i] = R_out( i, 2 );
00054     }
00055 
00056     // STEP 2 transform index origin
00057     boost::numeric::ublas::vector<float> origin_in( 3 );
00058 
00059     for( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ ) {
00060         origin_in( i ) = indexorig[i];
00061     }
00062 
00063     boost::numeric::ublas::vector<float> origin_out( 3 );
00064     origin_out = boost::numeric::ublas::prod( transform, origin_in );
00065 
00066     for( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ ) {
00067         indexorig[i] = origin_out( i );
00068     }
00069 
00070     // write modified values back into property map
00071     properties.setProperty<util::fvector4>( "indexOrigin", indexorig );
00072     properties.setProperty<util::fvector4>( "readVec", read );
00073     properties.setProperty<util::fvector4>( "phaseVec", phase );
00074     properties.setProperty<util::fvector4>( "sliceVec", slice );
00075 }
00076 
00077 }
00078 }
00079 }
